00037 //............................................................................
00038 void QMPool::put(void *b) {
00039     //lint -e946 -e1904             ignore MISRA Rule 103 in this precondition
00040     Q_REQUIRE((m_start <= b) && (b <= m_end)           /*  must be in range */
00041               && (m_nFree <= m_nTot));        // # free blocks must be < total
00042 
00043     QF_INT_LOCK_KEY_
00044     QF_INT_LOCK_();
00045 
00046     ((QFreeBlock *)b)->m_next = (QFreeBlock *)m_free;//link into the free list
00047     m_free = b;                            // set as new head of the free list
00048     ++m_nFree;                             // one more free block in this pool
00049 
00050     QS_BEGIN_NOLOCK_(QS_QF_MPOOL_PUT, QS::mpObj_, m_start)
00051         QS_TIME_();                                               // timestamp
00052         QS_OBJ_(m_start);                   // the memory managed by this pool
00053         QS_MPC_(m_nFree);             // the number of free blocks in the pool
00054     QS_END_NOLOCK_()
00055 
00056     QF_INT_UNLOCK_();
00057 }
00058     //lint -e946 -e1904             ignore MISRA Rule 103 in this precondition
